item.title: Full Guthans effect not working
item.dc:creator: @Mayflower Mayflower
item.description:
@Mayflower wrote:

I know the code runs all the way through, because it adds the GFX, but it doesn’t raise your hp…

[code]if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullGuthanEquipped()) {
int chance = 0;
chance = misc.random(10);

if(chance == 3) {
playerLevel[3] += (hitDiff / 2);
updateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“You drain the enemies health!”);
stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
}
}[/code]

Anyone know whats wrong?

Read full topic
